#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    char time[6];
    float angle;
    int t;
    int h, m;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while(t--)
    {

        scanf("%d %d", &h , &m);
        if(!(h >= 0 && h <= 23) ||  !(m >= 0 && m <= 59))
        {
            printf("Invalid Time\n");


        }
        else
        {
         //h=h%12;
        angle = 30*h - 5.5*m;
        if(angle<0)
            { angle *= -1;

            }
        if(angle>180)
            { angle = 360 - angle;

              }
        printf("%0.1f\n", angle);
          }
    }

    return 0;
}
